short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: User can set the wallpaper in new tab. And can also see the weather report and search on bing search engine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get weather info for selected location and use bing search engine while enjoying beautiful backgrounds.

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Sunny Days extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use (https://sunny-days.co/terms) and Policy (https://sunny-days.co/privacy)
